xwikidoc.content: ## Override ApplicationResource_fr.properties to be have consistent use of Tags instead of Balises in the french version tags=Tags core.tagedit.title=Tags : changes.tag.tags=Tags MMCode.MeetingClass_status_none=Futur meeting MMCode.MeetingClass_status_prepared=Prepared MMCode.MeetingClass_status_started=Started MMCode.MeetingClass_status_finished=Finished MMCode.MeetingClass_status_voteopen=Vote in process MMCode.MeetingClass_status_voteclosed=Vote finished MMCode.MeetingClass_privacy_private=Private MMCode.MeetingClass_privacy_public=Public MMCode.MeetingParticipantClass_participation_undecided=Unconfirmed MMCode.MeetingParticipantClass_participation_declined=Absent MMCode.MeetingParticipantClass_participation_confirmed=Confirmed MMCode.MeetingCycleClass_frequency_weekly=Every week MMCode.MeetingCycleClass_frequency_bimonthly=Every two weeks MMCode.MeetingCycleClass_frequency_monthly=Every month MMCode.MeetingCycleClass_frequency_quarterly=Every trimester MMCode.MeetingCycleClass_frequency_yearly=Every year xe.loading=Loading meetings.dashboard.youcanalso=You can also meetings.dashboard.or=or meetings.dashboard.createnewmeeting=Organize a meeting meetings.dashboard.pagename=Meeting page name meetings.dashboard.urlwillbe=The meeting can be accessed at the following URL: meetings.dashboard.createmeeting=Create the meeting meetings.dashboard.pickpagenamehelp=The name of the page is used to create the URL where you can access the meeting information. You will be able to give a more precise title for your meeting on the next page.. meetings.dashboard.gotocycles=View Meeting Cycles meetings.dashboard.grid.date=Date meetings.dashboard.grid.location=Location meetings.dashboard.grid.status=Status meetings.dashboard.grid.emptyvalue=- meetings.dashboard.grid.doc.title=Title meetings.dashboard.grid.doc.creator=Organizer meetings.dashboard.grid.doc.creationDate=Create on meetings.dashboard.grid.title=Title meetings.cycle.meetingsinthiscycle=Meetings in this cycle: meetings.cycle.createnextmeeting=Create the next meeting in this cycle meetings.cycle.frequency=Frequency: meetings.cycle.description=Description: meetings.cycle.weekly.fromlast=One week after the last meeting meetings.cycle.bimonthly.fromlast=Two weeks after the last meeting meetings.cycle.quarterly.fromlast=Three month after the last meeting meetings.cycle.yearly.fromlast=One Year after the last meeting meetings.cycle.nextmeeting=Next meeting: meetings.cycle.nextdate=Meeting date: meetings.cycle.submitcreate=Create the next meeting meetings.cycle.nextname=Meeting page Name: meetings.cycle.lastmeeting=Reminder - previous meeting in this cycle meetings.cycle.lastname=Title: meetings.cycle.lastdate=Date: meetings.cycle.laststatus=status: meetings.cycle.alreadyexists=This page already exists meetings.cycle.addingmeetingtocycle=Transformation of Cycle meeting meetings.cycles.listofcycles=Meeting Cycles: meetings.cycles.editcycle=Edit meetings.cycles.deletecycle=Delete meetings.meeting.docalreadyexists=This page already exists meetings.meeting.manager=Organizer meetings.meeting.makecycle=Create a cycle from this meeting meetings.meeting.sheettitle=Meeting Information meetings.meeting.tags=Tags : meetings.meeting.status=Status meetings.meeting.startmeeting=Start the meeting meetings.meeting.endmeeting=Finished the meeting meetings.meeting.startmeeting.help=By clicking on the button, you will start the meeting. You won't be able to edit anymore the meeting information. A new edit zone will be provided for your meeting report. meetings.meeting.endmeeting.help=By clicking on the button, you will end the meeting. You will still be able to edit the meeting report, but you won't be able to add participants. meetings.meeting.startmeeting.started=The meeting is now started. You can fill in the meeting report in the following edit area. meetings.meeting.startmeeting.warning=Once the meeting is started, you cannot edit the meeting information anymore. meetings.meeting.typist=Typist meetings.meeting.choosetypist.noparticipant=There is currently no participant in this meeting. You will be able to choose a typist once you have participants in the meeting. meetings.meeting.dostart=Start meetings.meeting.doend=End meetings.meeting.domakecycle=Create the cycle meetings.meeting.cycleurlwillbe=The cycle will be accessible at the following URL: meetings.meeting.minutes=Meeting Notes meetings.meeting.minutes.edit=Edit the report meetings.meeting.minutes.saved=The report has been successfully saved. meetings.meeting.tasks=Tasks meetings.meeting.tasks.edit=Edit the tasks meetings.meeting.tasks.saved=Les tasks have been successfully saved. meetings.meeting.youarethetypist=You are the meeting typist. The following edit area allows you to type your notes. You should save your notes regularly so that other participants can see the meeting report being filled in progressively. meetings.meeting.meetingnow=The meeting has started. You can check the meeting notes. meetings.meeting.dontforgettoclose=You should "end" the meeting once the report is written meetings.meeting.startmeeting.info=You are ready to start the meeting meetings.meeting.notypistselected=You have not chosen the meeting typist. Please select him from the participants. meetings.meeting.typistwillbe=*{0}* will be the typist for this meeting. meetings.meeting.minutes.empty=The meeting notes have not yet been started. Click on "edit" to start taking notes. meetings.meeting.tasks.empty=The meeting tasks have not yet been started. Click on "edit" to start editing the tasks. meetings.meeting.privacy=Access Rights: meetings.no_meeting=No meeting is associated with this document meetings.meeting.youarethemanager=You are the meeting organizer meetings.meeting.title=Title meetings.meeting.description=Agenda meetings.meeting.cyclicmeeting=This meeting is part of the following cycle: {0} meetings.meeting.meetingmanager=Organizer meetings.meeting.infos.edit=Edit the Meeting Details meetings.meeting.infos.save=Save meetings.meeting.infos.saved=Meeting details saved. meetings.meeting.infos.noparticipantyet=There are currently no participant in this meeting. You will be able to choose a typist once you have finalized the participant list. meetings.meeting.infos.comments={0} Comments(s) meetings.meeting.infos.attachments={0} Attached Files meetings.meeting.saveminutes=Save meetings.meeting.saveminutesandclose=Save and Close meetings.meeting.savetasks=Save meetings.meeting.savetasksandclose=Save and Close meetings.meeting.participants=Participants meetings.meeting.participants.noparticipant=There is currently no participant in this meeting meetings.meeting.participants.addparticipant=Add participants meetings.meeting.participants.searchparticipant=Participant lookup meetings.meeting.participants.add=Add meetings.meeting.participants.create=Create details ... meetings.meeting.participants.sendemail=eMail Notifications meetings.meeting.participants.confirmremove=You are ready to remove {0} from the participants. Are you sure you want to continue ? meetings.meeting.myparticipation.select=You will : meetings.meeting.myparticipation.message=Short message : meetings.meeting.myparticipation.save=OK meetings.meeting.myparticipation.modify=Change my availability meetings.meeting.date.edit=Edit the meeting date and location meetings.meeting.date=Preparing: date and location meetings.meeting.date.start=Start time (Optional - format: HH:MM) meetings.meeting.date.end=End time (Optional - format: HH:MM) meetings.meeting.date.date=Date : meetings.meeting.date.validate=Validate meetings.meeting.date.choosetype=Choose the date: choose your process meetings.meeting.date.fixed=Choose a fixed date meetings.meeting.date.vote=Let participants vote, and choose based on the results meetings.meeting.date.location=Location (Optional) meetings.meeting.date.displaymap=Show a map meetings.meeting.date.from=From meetings.meeting.date.to=to meetings.meeting.date.noinformation=There is currently no date and location information meetings.meeting.vote.finish=End the vote meetings.meeting.vote.finishvotehelp=You are ready to close the vote. You will be able to choose the final date for this meeting. You will be able to see the summary of the vote before chosing your meeting date. meetings.meeting.vote=Prepare: vote on the date and location meetings.meeting.vote.newoption=Add an option date/location: meetings.meeting.vote.newoption.button=Add an option meetings.meeting.vote.addoption=Add meetings.meeting.vote.sendmail=Mail Notification meetings.meeting.vote.sendmailhelp=Use the mail notification to invite participants to vote to choose the date and location of the meeting. meetings.meeting.vote.location=Location meetings.meeting.vote.time=Date and time meetings.meeting.vote.noproposal=There is currently no proposals for the vote meetings.meeting.vote.you=Vous meetings.meeting.vote.noparticipant=There is currently no participant in this meeting. When participants are invited you will see a summary table which each participant's availability. meetings.meeting.vote.options=Options meetings.meeting.vote.save=Save meetings.meeting.vote.update=Modify meetings.meeting.vote.result=Reminder of users votes: meetings.meeting.comments=Discussion meetings.meeting.addparticipantserror=An error occured when adding users. Please contact the site administrator. meetings.mail.personalnote=Personal Message {0}: meetings.mail.notification=Email notification meetings.mail.to=To: meetings.mail.subject=Subject: meetings.mail.body=Message: meetings.mail.personalnote=Personal Note meetings.mail.personalnoteextra=(Leave empty to not add a personal message) meetings.mail.cancel=Cqncel meetings.mail.send=Send the email(s) and continue meetings.mail.skip=Continue without saving the emails meetings.mail.missingemails=Somme emails are not listed in the Users profile. You can enter them manually. meetings.mail.missingallemails=Most emails are accessible. meetings.spacehome.title=Meeting Notes Space meetings.spacehome.mynextmeetings=My next meetings meetings.spacehome.seeallmeetings=All meeting meetings.spacehome.allmeetings=View all meetings meetings.spacehome.seemynextmeetings=View only my next meetings meetings.spacehome.meetingsTitle=Meeting Notes
